# The Threading Reference

<DoxygenPage pluginConfig={pluginConfig}>

Handle the structures needed to make LLVM safe for multithreading. <a href="#details">More...</a>

## Description {#details}

Handle the structures needed to make LLVM safe for multithreading.

## Functions

### LLVMIsMultithreaded() {#ga15803bf60790d58478c28726683e04bb}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LLVMBool LLVMIsMultithreaded (void)">
Check whether LLVM is executing in thread-safe mode or not.

### LLVMStartMultithreaded() {#ga50616bb97a453307661ba7a7e2d193c7}

<MemberDefinition
  prototype="LLVMBool LLVMStartMultithreaded (void)">
Deprecated: Multi-threading can only be enabled/disabled with the compile time define LLVM&#95;ENABLE&#95;THREADS.

This function always returns <a href="#ga15803bf60790d58478c28726683e04bb">LLVMIsMultithreaded()</a>.
